auth.signInRequiredToCreateTeam: You need to sign in to create a team.

features.description: Tournado provides all the tools you need to manage your sports tournaments efficiently. From team registration to match scheduling, we've got you covered.
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your tournaments
features.title: Tournament Management Made Easy

hero.description: Manage your sports tournaments with ease. Create, organize, and track your teams and matches in one place.

android.chrome: Tap the menu (⋮) and select "Install app"
android.samsung: Tap the menu (⋮) and select "Add page to" then "Home screen"
android.title: Install this app on your device

ios.chrome: Tap the share button and then "Add to Home Screen"
ios.firefox: Tap the hamburger menu then "Share" and "Add to Home Screen"
ios.safari: Tap the share button and then "Add to Home Screen"
ios.title: Install this app on your iPhone

other.instruction: Open browser menu and select "Add to Home Screen"
other.title: Install this app on your device
